front.title: Dual-Homing Protection for MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) Pseudowires

abstract.t: In some scenarios, the MPLS Trasport Profile (MPLS-TP) Pseudowires (PWs) are provisioned through either static configuration or management plane, where a dynamic control plane is not available. A fast protection mechanism for MPLS-TP PWs is needed to protect against the failure of Attachment Circuit (AC), the failure of Provider Edge (PE) and also the failure in the Packet Switched Network (PSN). This document proposes a dual-homing protection mechanism for MPLS-TP PWs, which can provide fast protection for comprehensive failure scenarios including the failure of AC, the PE node or the PSN network.
